name: Brisk Gen 13 | Barkbrown Dali
bio: Sup playa! I'm Brisk Gen 13 | Barkbrown Dali. I'm a Ventriloquist by day, and I like volunteering at the local kitten rescue shelter by night. I once dreamed of being a Aerobics Athlete . Now I can be found people-watching all day. Will you be the garlic butter to my maple syrup?
